titles.title: A resolution electing Robert M. Duncan, of the District of Columbia, as Secretary for the Majority of the Senate.
A resolution electing Robert M. Duncan, of the District of Columbia, as Secretary for the Majority of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution elects Robert M. Duncan, of the District of Columbia, as Secretary for the Majority of the Senate.
